name: W. L. O. Sekai Renai Kikou
summary: Much of the gameplay requires little interaction from the player as the majority of the time is spent reading the text that appears on the game's screen. The text being displayed represents the thoughts of the characters or the dialogue between them. The player is occasionally presented with choices to determine the direction of the game. Depending on what is chosen, the plot may progress in a specific direction. The PC version contains scenes of the protagonist having sex with the heroines, but these were removed for the console version.

name: W.L.O. Sekai Renai Kikousen
summary: The World Love Organization is here to raise the Japanese birth rate! Run!

name: Wladyslaw
summary: You are a citizen of the Władysław Empire. Sealed from the outside world by towering Walls you get mixed up in a ritual that changes your body. Now trapped in the Castle of Władysław only one thing is on your mind. Can you escape the Castle?
